actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration, S. Rept. 93-1052.

official_title: An original authorizing supplemental expenditures by the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs for inquiries and investigations during the period March 1, 1973.

summary.text: Authorizes supplemental expenditures of $3,200 by the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs for inquiries and investigations during the period March 1, 1973, through February 28, 1974.

titles.title: An original authorizing supplemental expenditures by the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs for inquiries and investigations during the period March 1, 1973.
